mapper.sql: select evt_no, evt_startdate, evt_enddate, evt_regdate, evt_content, evt_file, evt_title from event
select win_no, win_regdate, win_text, win_title from winner
mapper.select: select evt_no, evt_startdate, evt_enddate, evt_regdate, evt_content, evt_file, evt_title from event where evt_enddate > to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') and to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') > evt_startdate order by evt_no
mapper.insert: insert into event (evt_no, evt_startdate, evt_enddate, evt_regdate, evt_content, evt_file, evt_title) values (EVENT_SEQ.nextval, #{evtStartDate}, #{evtEndDate},to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:Mi:SS'), #{evtContent} , #{evtFile} , #{evtTitle})
mapper.update:
update event set evt_startdate=#{evtStartDate}, evt_enddate=#{evtEndDate}, evt_regdate=to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:Mi:SS'), evt_content=#{evtContent}, evt_file=#{evtFile}, evt_title=#{evtTitle}
where evt_no=#{evtNo}
mapper.select: select * from event where evt_title like '%'||#{text}||'%' order by evt_no
mapper.insert: insert into winner (win_no, win_title, win_regdate, win_text) values (WINNER_SEQ.nextval, #{winTitle}, #{winRegdate}, #{winText})
